snippet: A one-two punch of worries about Congressional gridlock on urgent fiscal policies and economic weakness in Europe sent stocks reeling.
abstract: One-two punch of worries about Congressional gridlock on urgent fiscal policies and economic weakness in Europe sends stocks reeling; major United States indexes fall more than 2 percent, with the Dow Jones industrial average suffering its largest daily decline in a year, falling 312.95 points to 12,932.73.

byline.original: By FLOYD NORRIS and NELSON D. SCHWARTZ

lead_paragraph: A one-two punch of worries about Congressional gridlock on urgent fiscal policies and economic weakness in Europe sent stocks reeling.

headline.seo: Concerns Over Europe and Congressional Gridlock Shake Markets
headline.main: Europe’s Woes and Worries Over U.S. Plans Rattle Markets
headline.print_headline: Europe’s Woes And Worries Over U.S. Plans Rattle Markets
